'''Flower of Life''', or simply "'''the Flower'''," is an [[Artifact]] Piece in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It increases a [[character]]'s HP attribute by adding flat +HP and is one of the two Artifact Pieces to have a set main affix (along with the [[Plume of Death]]). Artifact Pieces can appear in all qualities (1–5 stars).
